title: still being forced to carry bronze against gold just to stay in silver
body: How bout instead of releasing skins Riot actualy focuses on gameplay for once.

replies.body:
I call bullshit.

Not a single one of your past 10 ranked games had a bronze on your team or the enemy team for that matter.  It was mostly silver 4-2 with the occasional gold 5 or 4 on both teams.

EDIT: just looked at your posts here, its mostly complaining about matchmaking and a couple of champs. Ugh can't believe I wasted my time actually responding

Rank =/= MMR. His MMR was mid Silver at best. I got placed Silver from Plat and I had to beat former Plats to climb to Gold, and now more of the same to climb through it. That's just the way it is until later in the season.

Riot = a for profit publically traded company. Fixing their terrible MMR / ranked system is not even on the list. Why because we are all still here playing and spending money on the system they have today. 

Plus with the geniuses in charge now who thought it would be a great idea to remove ranked 5's and solo queue.... Do you really want these kinds of **idiots **"fixing" the ranked system? I mean I am sure it can get much worse and they almost certainly would do just that.
